CustomField.formula: IF(LeadId==null,Text(Contact.Account.RTL_Age__c), CASE(TEXT ( Lead.RTL_Age__c ), "<= 21 years", $Label.RTL_Age_Low_21, "22 – 26 years", $Label.RTL_Age_22_To_26, "27 – 40 years", $Label.RTL_Age_27_To_40, "41 – 60 years", $Label.RTL_Age_41_To_60, "> 60 years", $Label.RTL_Age_Up_60,TEXT ( Lead.RTL_Age__c )))
CustomField.label: Age
